name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove 'See similar posts' button on X

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the 'See Similar Posts' element on X.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the 'See Similar Posts' element seen under an X post. The 'See Similar Posts' element frequently shows up late and pushes down the reply box causing users to accidentally click it when attempting to reply. This removes the element entirely.
